mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeBoard (fb_category, fb_title, fb_content, member_userId) VALUES (#{fb_category}, #{fb_title}, #{fb_content}, #{member_userId})
mapper.select: SELECT f.fb_number, f.fb_category, f.fb_title, f.fb_content, f.fb_insertDatetime, f.member_userId, f.fb_viewCount, m.nickName, fi.fb_fileName, m.profileImage, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM freeBoardLike WHERE freeBoard_fb_number = f.fb_number AND member_userId = #{member_userId}) liked, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM freeBoardLike WHERE freeBoard_fb_number = f.fb_number) fb_likeCount, (SELECT profileImage_file FROM profileImage WHERE member_userId = f.member_userId) profileImg FROM freeBoard f LEFT JOIN member m ON f.member_userId = m.userId LEFT JOIN freeBoardFileAttach fi ON f.fb_number = fi.freeBoard_fb_number WHERE fb_number = #{fb_number}
mapper.update: UPDATE freeBoard SET fb_category = #{fb_category}, fb_title = #{fb_title}, fb_content = #{fb_content} WHERE fb_number = #{fb_number}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM freeBoardLike WHERE freeBoard_fb_number = #{fb_number} AND member_userId = #{member_userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM freeBoardLike WHERE freeBoard_fb_number = #{fb_number} AND member_userId = #{member_userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM freeBoardLike WHERE freeBoard_fb_number = #{fb_number}

SELECT f.fb_number, f.fb_category, f.fb_title, f.fb_viewCount, f.fb_insertDatetime, COUNT(DISTINCT r.fb_replyNumber) fb_replyCount, COUNT(DISTINCT l.member_userId) fb_likeCount, DENSE_RANK() OVER (ORDER BY fb_likeCount DESC) as ranking FROM (select * from freeBoard f where f.fb_insertDatetime > date_add(now(),interval -1 week)) f LEFT JOIN freeBoardReply r ON f.fb_number = r.freeBoard_fb_number LEFT JOIN freeBoardLike l ON f.fb_number = l.freeBoard_fb_number GROUP BY f.fb_number ORDER BY fb_likeCount DESC, fb_viewCount DESC LIMIT 5
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO freeBoardFileAttach (freeBoard_fb_number, fb_fileName, fb_filePath, fb_fileType) VALUES (#{fb_number}, #{fb_fileName}, #{fb_filePath}, #{fb_fileType})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM freeBoardFileAttach WHERE freeBoard_fb_number = #{fb_number} AND fb_fileName = #{originalFilename}
